definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Cantaloup is a large fruit, and it grows on sandy soil.
sentences.chinese: 香瓜是一種大型的水果，而它生長在沙土上。

sentences.english: More than 50 people across US and Canada got sick after eating the melons .
sentences.chinese: 在美國和加拿大，已有50多人因食用香瓜而致病。

sentences.english: Cantaloup is belonged to cucurbitaceous, a year of rampant herb.
sentences.chinese: 香瓜屬葫蘆科，一年蔓生草本植物。

sentences.english: Cantaloup is this kind of fruit good?
Dean adn Betty pigged on cantaloupe yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 譯爲安迪和貝蒂昨天吃了很多香瓜。

sentences.english: Down at the bottom, I have some Mexican tomatoes called tomatillos .
sentences.chinese: 這邊有香瓜，那頭有墨西哥西紅柿。

sentences.english: Yellow quinces in buckets with green melons were stored on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 黃黃的榲桲裝小桶和綠綠的香瓜同放陽臺。

sentences.english: Han Jia, I ate your muskmelon.
sentences.chinese: 哎，韓佳，你把香瓜給我吃了。

sentences.english: Today, I held my cousin's new baby, whom I have nicknamed Canteloupe Head.
sentences.chinese: 今天我抱着表哥家的小寶寶，叫他香瓜腦袋。

sentences.english: Slice up a a honeydew melon or cantaloupe into chunks.
sentences.chinese: 把蜜瓜或美國香瓜切成塊。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe/also written 哈密瓜
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
a variety of orange grown in Guangdong, Sichuan, Taiwan etc
